name: Interdimensional Crane Conquerer
description:
so basically your a crow being chased by a interdimensional Worm and you have to climb a space crane to escape. 

For Mini jam 99

System Requirements for game

RTX 5060 with about 160gb ram yea that'll do oh and also you need a 12k monitor.
